Name: FITRIZ
About the game: Beautiful berries, lovely legumes, and wonderful vegetables! And some pizza plus ice cream afterwards. Collect more than 175 delicious plant-based food items (with real nutritional values) and learn more about vitamins and minerals while having fun with this food-puzzle game. With the help of cutlery and your raccoon friend you will dig through mountains of food in 30 yummy levels. Choose between three degrees of difficulty that will challenge beginners and puzzle-veterans alike. You will have to handle serving after serving of delicious food, while trying to get those important micronutrients in. Features: (Play & learn) Play: -Complete line after line of delicious foods -Complete and devour up to 5 lines at a time for maximum score -Use cutlery, the raccoon or a bomb to push down blocks or get rid of them -Dig through 3 difficulties and 30 levels of yummy food And Learn: -Collect 177 food items and discover what nutrients they contain -Collect 38 sport activities -Learn about the function and importance of vitamins and minerals -Learn about the function and importance of macronutrients -Learn about daily recommendations of nutrients -Get tips for a healthy diet with linked scientific information
